title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 366 - Local Solid Waste Management Planning
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 366 - Local Solid Waste Management Planning

State Regulations

Subpart 366-1 - General (§ 366-1.1 to 366-1.2)

Subpart 366-2 - Local Solid Waste Management Plan (LSWMP) Contents (§ 366-2.1 to 366-2.7)

Subpart 366-3 - LSWMP Public Participation (§ 366-3.1)

Subpart 366-4 - LSWMP Approval (§ 366-4.1 to 366-4.2)

Subpart 366-5 - LSWMP Biennial Updates (§ 366-5.1 to 366-5.2)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 366

Amended

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law
§§ 1-0101, 3-0301, titles 1, 7, and 10 of article 27, title 1 of
article 70, and titles 27, 35, 40 and 44 of article
71

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
